item.title: Vim commands
item.description: started to use vim for having a multi line indentation, it is not at all having steap learning curve First think to rememeber when in vim- esc/i to make multi line indentation, have to space based instead of tab based set expandtab esc then shift+v then choose the lines then > for space based indentation which is identified by markdown to view the hidden charecters, good for editing markdowns

item.title: Decoding the polyline encoded line vectors
